pages.title: So what are there?
pages.text: $(br2)$(br2)This section will walk you through on how to get your hands on basic resources. These are used to craft various things.

pages.title: Meteorite Pieces
pages.text: Meteorite pieces can be obtained by mining meteorites(ores) found in comets and meteors fallen on the world(see next page). They come in crude, regular and rich versions. $(br2)They can be used to craft items related to the star, the street of the stellar, the $(l)Hoshimachi$().

pages.title: The Stellarite
pages.text: The $(#50e5f9)Stellarite$() is a rare material, combining the power of the stars.

pages.title: Tourmaline
pages.text: Tourmaline is a mineral containing electricity. Its ore can be found almost everywhere.

pages.title: Plants
pages.text: Plants are the basis for most food items in $(#34c9fe)HoloContinuum$(). They are available pretty much everywhere in chests, villages etc...

pages.title: Alternative ways
pages.text: There are also some alternative ways to obtain plants. You can find rice in seagrass, and curry in ferns.
Copper rods are used to make different tools and weapons. They are crafted using normal copper.
